FuncDef:
The clock run-mode command configures a running mode for an Ethernet equipment clock (EEC). The running mode can be free-running, hold, or normal.
The default running mode is normal.
The default running mode is normal.
ExtraInfo:
Usage Scenario
You can run this command to configure a clock running mode for the
NE40E.
If you configure free, the system clock works in free-running mode. In this mode, the NE40E does not use the clock source selection algorithm to select a clock source.If you configure hold, the system clock works in hold mode. In this mode, the NE40E uses the locked clock signals.If you configure normal, the NE40E uses the clock source selection algorithm to select a clock source. If no clock source is available, the system clock automatically works in free-running or hold mode.

Precautions
In VS mode, this command is supported only by the admin VS.
